metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12450 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: The alpha_vms_object_p function in bfd/vms-alpha.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29 and earlier, allows remote attackers to cause an out of bounds heap write and possibly achieve code execution via a crafted vms alpha file.

notes.Note: sbeattie> reproducers attached to bug report

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
